snippet: James L. Dolan, the Madison Square Garden chairman, has been unwilling to do what he continually asks of Knicks fans: keep the faith and invest in the potential for success.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column asserts that by officially cutting ties to Jeremy Lin, New York Knicks owner James L Dolan flunks the faith test he continually puts to his ticket-buying fan base.
lead_paragraph: James L. Dolan, the Madison Square Garden chairman, has been unwilling to do what he continually asks of Knicks fans: keep the faith and invest in the potential for success.

headline.seo: Dolan Breaks Faith With Knicks Fans Again
headline.main: Faith Moves Mountains, but Not Dolan
headline.print_headline: Faith Moves Mountains, but Not Dolan
